page.title: 06AT THE MOSQUE IN PRESTON
page.content: I am a Muslim I go to a mosque to pray. Good Muslims pray five times a day. When we go to the mosque we take off our shoes. We have to wear a hat called a Topee. We have to wash our hands, face and feet very carefully. This is called Wazoo. Then we all face Mecca. The Imam says the prayer called Namaz and the people have to listen. We have to kneel down when the Imam tells us. In the evening children go to the mosque to read the Quran and learn about Islam. In class we kneel down and put our Quran on a wooden stand. When we are in the top class we have to learn the Quran off by heart.
